vehicles.name: Phantom Stage
vehicles.desc: A stagecoach that appears on lonely roads at midnight, driven by no one visible. She stops for passengers who didn't flag her down and takes them somewhere that isn't on the map.
vehicles.notes: Pre-built phantom coach for immediate horror encounters. She appears, she collects, she delivers — to somewhere terrible.

vehicles.name: Cursed Longship
vehicles.desc: A Viking ship crewed by draugr — the undead Norse warriors who refuse to stop raiding just because they're dead. She appears from the fog, she raids, and she vanishes.
vehicles.notes: Pre-built cursed longship for immediate maritime horror. Undead Vikings on a ghost ship — the scenario writes itself.

vehicles.name: Demonic Chariot
vehicles.desc: A war chariot from the lower planes, wreathed in hellfire and pulled by beasts that shouldn't exist in the mortal world. She carries a demon lord to war.
vehicles.notes: Pre-built demonic chariot for immediate infernal encounters. The vehicle of the campaign's ultimate antagonist.
